altTitles.ja: スライムライフ

description.en: The stories of the everyday life of a black mage and a slime that run a magic store together as master and servant.

altTitles.en: The Garnet that Sparkles in Junk

altTitles.ja: ゴミ溜めのガーネット

description.en:
Kanae, a hitman, encounters a half vampire named Sara at a dump site and is attacked. With nothing to lose, Kanae is completely indifferent to having his blood sucked or his home invaded.

Sara, a bloodthirsty defective vampire abandoned by his parents, offers Kanae a deal: “In return for taking care of your decrepit lifestyle, become my food...”

What begins as a physical relationship fueled by the arousal of bloodsucking, brings a warmth they’ve never known, melting away the loneliness they’ve both carried — A love story where two lost souls find each other amidst a cruel and unforgiving world.

altTitles.ja: 機動戦史ガンダム 武頼

description.en:
A new Gundam war picture scroll, where giant "Tetsuki" scatter the sparks of conflict, is born!

"Sankin Koutai" a large battle tournament where fierce fighters selected from all over the country board giant armored warriors known as Tetsuki to determine the strongest. In order to fulfill his wish, Kotetsu Kisaragi with his "Gundam" Burai, throws himself into the harsh battle...!
description.ja:
巨大な“鉄機”達が火華を散らす、新たなガンダム戦絵巻、爆誕!!

参勤鋼對――それは、全国各地から選ばれた猛者が、巨大な鎧武者・鉄機に乗り込み、最強を決める一大バトルトーナメント。『頑駄無』武頼を駆る如月虎鉄は、己が望みを果たすため過酷な戦へと身を投じるが…！？
description.pt-br: Uma nova história de guerra Gundam  nasce, onde os gigantescos 'Tetsuki' espalham as chamas do conflito. O 'Sankin Koutai', um grande torneio de batalha em que lutadores selecionados em todo o país, embarcam em guerreiros blindados gigantes conhecidos como Tetsuki, para determinar o mais forte. Kotetsu Kisaragi, com seu 'Gundam' Burai, se joga nesta batalha dura para cumprir seu desejo.

altTitles.ja: ラブラッシュ！

description.en:
Hakuba Reiji was born with a rare condition that makes him look incredibly attractive to all the girls around him. And as he's turning 18, he discovers to his shock that this is not limited to human girls, as the Cupid princess Kokoro Roko Rokoko also falls for his charms.

The only girl who's seemingly imune to them is the one he actually has a crush on: his childhood friend Shizuku.
description.ja: 異様に女性にモテてしまう特殊な遺伝子の持ち主・白馬レイジ。だけど意中の幼馴染・一宮シズクには効果がない上に相手にされず…。そんなレイジの前に天使・ココロが求婚に現れて恋は大混乱!?　全種族方位型ラブコメ開幕!!
description.pt-br: Reiji Hakuba tem uma condição genética que faz as meninas enlouquecem por ele. É o chamado Gene Ubermale, e as garotas o verão automaticamente como o cara mais bonitão, que elas nunca verão na vida. Isto pode soar como um sonho se tornado realidade, mas algo que você ama muito pode se tornar um pesadelo. E as coisas realmente se complicam quando as meninas não-humanos começam a persegui-lo. Especificamente, iniciando com uma princesa Cupido do Reino Divino!

title.en: Isekai de Haishin Katsudou wo Shitara Tairyou no Yandere Shinja wo Umidashite Shimatta Ken

altTitles.ja: 異世界で配信活動をしたら大量のヤンデレ信者を生み出してしまった件

altTitles.en: When I Started Streaming in Another World, I Ended Up Creating a Large Number of Yandere Followers

description.en: Living in Ataraxia, a world of swords and magic, a reincarnated individual decided to make a living out of streaming. Living in a world where such a thing did not exist despite the many forms of entertainment, he quickly made a name for himself. This is not the tale of just a streamer... but of a boy who becomes a legend as a haishinsha.
description.ja: 剣と魔法の世界アタラシア――その世界に生きる一人の転生者が配信活動に手を出した。 数多くの娯楽はあれど、そのようなモノが存在しなかった世界で彼はたちまち有名になった。 これは異世界で唯一の配信者……ではなく、ハイシンシャになろうと考えた少年の物語である。
description.vi: Anh nhân vật chính của chúng ta được chuyển sinh sang thế giới có sự tồn tại của ma thuật. Sở hữu trong mình sức mạnh bá ko tả nổi, anh sẽ đánh bại quái vật để kiếm sống ư? Không, anh chê, anh muốn theo đuổi đam mê, anh muốn làm streamer để kiếm sống.

altTitles.en: Higanjima - Last 47 days

altTitles.ja: 彼岸島 最後の47日間

altTitles.th: เกาะกระหายเลือด - 47วันสุดท้ายสู่หายนะ

description.en:
This is a continuation of the story of Higanjima : featuring an isolated island, inhabited by warring vampires and humans, and surrounded by aquatic demons that foil any attempts at entry or escape that are not explicitly authorised by their vampiric overlord , Miyabi.   
  
Ryousuke, his girlfriend Kazumi, and his friend Yamaoka are shipwrecked by the demons, and wash up on the shore of Higanjima. They soon experience the monstrous cruelty of the island's vampires first-hand but, luckily, Ryousuke is able to join up with the human resistance.   
  
His only desire is to leave Higanjima…however, mainland Japan may not be safe for long either. If the vampiric threat is not eradicated in 47 days, then Miyabi's machinations will transform it into yet another vampire island!
description.fr:
Akira et la résistance humaine sont parvenus à conquérir le temple fortifié où résidait Miyabi. Alors que les derniers survivants profitent d'un repos de quelques jours bien mérité, un groupe d'étudiants échoue sur l'île d'Higanjima après avoir été attaqué par les démons marins. Ryosuke, Kasumi et Yamaoka vont très rapidement découvrir la cruauté sans limite des vampires.  
  
Miyabi, de son côté, ne compte pas en rester là et se prépare à attaquer le Japon directement grâce au nouveau moyen qu'il a trouvé pour vamprisier un maximum d'humain en un temps record. Son plan nécessite cependant 47 jours avant de pouvoir être mis en oeuvre.

title.en: A Story About Getting a Haircut After Hearing Your Crush Prefers Short Hair

altTitles.ja: 好きな人がショートカット好きと知って髪切る話

altTitles.en: Cutting Her Hair After Finding out That the Person She Likes, Likes Short Cuts

altTitles.vi: Cắt tóc sau khi biết gu cậu bạn mình thầm thích là tóc ngắn

altTitles.ja-ro: Suki na Hito ga Short-cut Suki to Shitte Kami Kiru Hanashi
Sukina Hito ga Sho-tokattosuki to Shitte Kami Kiru Hanashi

altTitles.es-la: Una historia sobre cortarse el pelo después de oír que su crush prefiere el pelo corto.

altTitles.id: Potong Rambut Setelah Tau Kalau Mas Crush Bilang Suka Rambut Pendek

altTitles.vi: 割𩯀婁欺別所慼倘伴命啿慼羅𩯀短 (Nom Script)

altTitles.pl: Historia o tym jak obcięłam włosy po tym jak usłyszałam, że ten, kto mi się podoba preferuje krótkie włosy

altTitles.pt-br: Uma história sobre cortar o cabelo depois de descobrir que a pessoa que você gosta gosta de cortes curtos

altTitles.th: เรื่องราวการตัดผลหหลังจากได้ยินคนที่ชอบพูดว่าชอบสาวผมสั้น

altTitles.uk: Підстриглася після того, як дізналася, що коханий полюбляє короткі стрижки

altTitles.id: Potong Rambut Karena Mas Crush Bilang Suka Rambut Pendek

description.en:
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/114158543)

altTitles.en: The Eminence in Shadow

altTitles.ja: 陰の実力者になりたくて！

altTitles.en: I Want To Be The Eminence In Shadow!
To Be a Power in the Shadows!

altTitles.vi: Ta Muốn Trở Thành Chúa Tể Bóng Tối!

description.en:
Just like how everyone adored heroes in their childhood, a certain young man adored those powers hidden in shadows. Ninjas, rogues, shadowy mentor types, that sort of deal.  
After hiding his strength and living the mediocre life of a NPC by day while undergoing frenzied training by night, he finally reincarnates into a different world and gains ultimate power.  
The young man who is only pretending to be a power in the shadows… his subordinates who took him more seriously than he expected… and a giant organization in the shadows that gets accidentally trampled…  
This is the story of a young boy who had adored powers in shadows possibly eventually reigning over the world of shadows in another world.
description.ru:
Подобно тому, как некоторые в детстве боготворят героев, один юноша обожал силы, скрывающиеся в тени. Скрыв свою силу и прожив посредственную жизнь посредственного персонажа, проходя в это время через безумные ночные тренировки, он в конце концов перерождается в ином мире, обретая абсолютную силу. Юноша, отыгрывающий роль скрывающейся в тени силы, его неправильно всё понимающие подчинённые и огромная стёртая в пыль теневая организация… Это история о юноше, обожавшем скрывающиеся во мраке силы, который, вероятно, в итоге обретёт власть над теневой стороной иного мира.   
  
  
- [Japanese Light Novel (Bookwalker)](https://bookwalker.jp/series/179219/)  
- [Japanese Light Novel (Amazon.co.jp)](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4047353027/)  
- [LN Vol. 1 Youtube Promo](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9pahhkIs4Ss),with Kentarou Kumagai (熊谷健太郎) voicing the MC (Cid Kagenou)
description.es-la: Tal cual como todos adoraban héroes en su niñez, cierto adolescente adoraba los poderes que se esconden en las sombras. Tras haber ocultado su fuerza y viviendo la vida mediocre de un mob durante el día y entrenando descontroladamente por la noche, él finalmente reencarna en un mundo diferente y gana el poder definitivo. El adolescente que solo juega a ser una eminencia en las sombras, sus subordinados confusos, y una gigante organización en las sombras que es pisoteada... Esta es la historia de un adolescente que adoraba esos poderes en las sombras y que posiblemente llegue a reinar en las sombras de otro mundo.

altTitles.en: I'm in Love With the Older Girl Next Door

altTitles.ja: 隣のお姉さんが好き

altTitles.en: I Love The Older Girl Next Door.

altTitles.pt-br: Eu amo a garota mais velha da casa ao lado.

description.en: There's this beautiful, bubbly, film-loving girl who's three years older than me: her name's Shia, and she lives right next door! I'm madly in love with her, and I needed some way to see her! I settled on asking her for movie recommendations, and now I get to meet her every Wednesday! I want to know more about her, and tell her how I feel... but I just can't get the message across! Enjoy this lopsided rom-com brought to you by the author of "The Girl I Like Forgot Her Glasses" and "Paper Braver", Koume Fujichika!
description.pt-br:
**Minha Vizinha Cinéfila**

Tem essa garota linda, super animada e apaixonada por filmes que mora bem ao lado: o nome dela é Shia, e ela é três anos mais velha que eu! Sou completamente apaixonado por ela, e precisava de um jeito de vê-la! Decidi pedir recomendações de filmes, e agora a encontro toda quarta-feira! Quero saber mais sobre ela e contar o que sinto... mas simplesmente não consigo me expressar! Curta essa comédia romântica desequilibrada do mesmo autor de "A Garota de Quem Gosto Esqueceu os Óculos" e "Paper Braver".

altTitles.ja: 魔法学園の大罪魔術師

altTitles.en: The Great Sin Magician of the Magic Academy

description.en: Julis Anderburg, a boy who cannot use magic in a world where magic is omipresent, is the son of a remote lord and has no magical talent, but he lives a life that he cannot be ashamed as a nobleman. Still, for a boy who can't use magic, this world is stuffy. So he thought:  "Even if you can't use magic, you should be able to use something else, right?" And so Julis tries to use the magical power in the air to interfere with the world, unlike the magic that uses the magical power in the body to interfere with the world. And he succeeded, in devising this new mana utilization! After that, he helps Cecilia, a girl who is called "Saintess" by chance. Julis had a good life with Cecilia, but one day his father asked him to enroll in the "Magic Academy" with Cecilia.
description.ja: 魔法が浸透している世界で魔法が使えない辺境領主の息子、ユリス・アンダーブルク。魔法が使えない少年にとって、この世界は息苦しい。 故に彼は考えた。「魔法が使えないなら、別の物を使えるようになればいいんじゃね？」 そしてユリスは世界に干渉する「魔術」を編み出すことに成功する。ひょんなことから『聖女』と呼ばれている少女・セシリアを助け楽しい生活を送っていたユリスだが、ある日、父からセシリアと一緒に『魔法学園』に入学しないかと言われて――。

title.en: Iinazuke ga Dekita to Omottara, Sono Iinazuke ga Gakkou de Yuumei na "Akuyaku Reijou" Dattan dakedo, Dou Sureba Ii?

altTitles.ja: 許嫁が出来たと思ったら、その許嫁が学校で有名な『悪役令嬢』だったんだけど、どうすればいい？

altTitles.ja-ro: Iinazuke ga Dekita to Omottara, Sono Iinazuke ga Gakkou de Yuumei na "Akuyaku Reijou" datta n dakedo, Dou Sureba Ii?

altTitles.en: It Turns Out That I Have a Fiancée, but She Is the Famous "Villainess" of the School. What Should I Do?

altTitles.pt-br: Acontece que eu tenho uma noiva, mas ela é a famosa "vilã" da escola. O que devo fazer?

description.en:
"I have a fiancée...?"

One day, Higashi Kujou Hiroyuki, an ordinary high school student, is told a surprising fact by his father about an arranged engagement.

His fiancée is Kiryu Ayane, the "Villainess" at school, known to everyone for her sharp tongue and coldhearted personality. 

A heartwarming love story of two high school students that melts the icy heart of a "Villainess" begins!
description.ja:
許嫁がいる……ある日、父から驚きの事実を聞かされた普通の高校生・東九条浩之。
その許嫁とは、学園の誰もが知る、クールでドライな“悪役令嬢”・桐生彩音だった!?

悪役令嬢の氷の心を溶かす、高校生たちの胸あつく少しせつない恋愛ストーリー――！
description.pt-br:
"Eu tenho uma noiva...?"

Um dia, Higashi Kujou Hiroyuki, um estudante comum do ensino médio, ouve um fato surpreendente de seu pai sobre um noivado arranjado.

Sua noiva é Kiryuu Ayane, a "Vilã" da escola, conhecida por todos por sua língua afiada e personalidade fria.

Uma história de amor comovente de dois estudantes do ensino médio que derrete o coração gelado de uma "Vilã" começa!

title.en: A Story in Which an Older Brother Becomes a Little Sister

altTitles.ja-ro: Onii-chan ga Imouto ni naru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんが妹になる話

description.en: When I woke up in the morning, my brother became a sister! He thought they were swapped, but only he remains in his sister's form and they look identical!
description.fr: Quand je me suis réveillé un matin, mon frère est devenu ma sœur ! Il pensait qu'ils étaient échangés, mais lui seul change dans la forme de sa sœur et elles sont identiques !

altTitles.ja: みだれたふたりのみたされごはん

altTitles.en: Make Me Eat! Make Me Happy!
A Satisfying Meal For An Obscene Pair

altTitles.ja: 酔っぱらいin永遠亭 (東方)

altTitles.en: Drunkards in Eientei (Touhou)

title.en: Yearning for a Night Full of You

altTitles.ja: 君めく夜に焦がれて

description.en: Saint Ruri Girl's Academy. At this academy, there are two opposing factions: the "Ruri Class," consisting of refined, well-bred ladies, and the "Ai Class," made up of delinquents with poor behavior. Nanase Mitsuki, among the students of the Ai Class, is the most feared by the Ruri Class due to her intimidating appearance, though Mitsuki harbors a complex about her looks. One night, she meets Hosho Yuka, a young lady wandering alone at night... A sweet and fleeting love story between two people who are only allowed to meet at night.

altTitles.en: One Punch-Man
One Punch Man
OPM

altTitles.ja: ワンパンマン

description.en: Follows the life of an average part-time hero who manages to win every battle with a single punch. This ability frustrates him as he no longer feels the thrill of fighting a tough opponent, which leads him to question his past desire of becoming strong.
description.ru: История следует за жизнью героя, который умудряется выигрывать все битвы одним единственным ударом. Эта способность его раздражает, так как он больше не чувствует азарта и возбуждения во время жесткой схватки, что приводит к тому, что он сомневается в своем давнем желании стать сильным.

title.en: S Rank Boukensha de Aru Ore no Musume-tachi wa Juudo no Father Con de Shita

altTitles.en: My Daughters, S-Rank Adventurers, Have a Severe Obsession With Their Father

altTitles.ja: Sランク冒険者である俺の娘たちは重度のファザコンでした

altTitles.ru: Мои дочери, которые являются искателями приключений S-ранга, очень сильно увлеклись

altTitles.zh: 身为S级冒险者的我，女儿却是重度父控

description.en: The youngest A-rank adventurer, child prodigy Kaiser, finds three babies who were the only survivor of a destroyed village. Then he decided to give up his job as an adventurer and raise them. Over time, the girls grow brightly and show exceptional talents in fencing, magic and management. However, these girls also seem to love their father, Kaiser!
description.ja:
将来を嘱望されていた最年少のＡランク冒険者カイゼルは自分のミスで守るべき村をドラゴンに焼き尽くされてしまう……。絶望の淵に立たされた彼が、焼け野原で見つけたのが村の唯一の生き残りである――３人の赤ん坊だった。希望の光に満ちた赤ん坊を胸に、カイゼルは誓う。

「この子たちは、俺が立派に育て幸せにしてみせる！」

時は経ち、娘たちは彼の尽力の甲斐もあり立派に成長を遂げ、剣技に、経営に、魔法に、稀有な才能を花開かせようとしていた。

だけど、困ったことが1つだけ……。
優秀過ぎる娘たちが父・カイゼルを大好き過ぎて――!?

altTitles.ja: みにくい遊郭の子

altTitles.en: Ugly Duckling of the Entertainment District

altTitles.vi: Cô nàng xấu xí ở Phố Đèn Đỏ

description.en:
An abandoned high school girl becomes an Oiran in a strange world—

Esora, a high school girl who lost her place, found herself in an unknown red light district. She was sold to a slave buyer at the Yukaku "Sagamiya". The owner, Sagami, told her that Ishe could be the number one Oiran there.
description.ja: 居場所を失った女子高生エソラは、気がつくと知らない花街にいた。人買いに売られやってきたのは、遊郭「相模屋」。その主人である相模に、ここで1番の花魁になれると言われ―。幻想的な世界観で描かれる異世界花魁物語。
description.vi:
Một nữ sinh trung học bị bỏ rơi trở thành Oiran (kỹ nữ cao cấp) ở một thế giới xa lạ—
Esora, một nữ sinh trung học bị mất chỗ ở, thấy mình đang ở một khu đèn đỏ vô danh. Cô bị bán cho một người mua nô lệ ở Phố đèn đỏ "Sagamiya". Người chủ, Sagami, nói với cô rằng nếu cô trở thành Oiran thì sẽ có thể làm lại cuộc đời.

altTitles.en: unOrdinary

description.en: The world is not perfect. Learning to deal with its flaws is just a normal part of life. But there comes a point where these imperfections spawn a crushing realization… that something needs to change…
description.es: El mundo no es perfecto. Aprender a lidiar con sus defectos es una parte normal de la vida. Pero llega un momento en que esas imperfecciones nos hacen darnos cuenta de que algo tiene que cambiar...
description.pl: Świat nie jest doskonały. Nauka radzenia sobie z jego wadami jest tylko normalną częścią życia. Ale pojawia się punkt, w którym te niedoskonałości burzą miażdżącą realizację… że coś musi się zmienić…
description.pt-br: O mundo não é perfeito. Aprender a lidar com suas falhas é apenas uma parte normal da vida. Mas chega um ponto em que essas imperfeições geram uma percepção esmagadora… de que algo precisa mudar.

altTitles.ja: サキュバスがやってきたお話

altTitles.en: The Story of a Succubus Who Came to the Human World

description.en: The story of a Succubus who comes to the human world to absorb life force energy. Accidentally, she lives as a child in a strange man's house.

When a new serial killer arises in her city, Finn suspects that he may be related to her past. Against her better judgement, she decides to pursue him in hopes of finding answers. Shortly after, Finn meets Isaac, who reminds her too much of the mysterious boy from her past...

altTitles.ja: ボーイミーツガールミーツボーイ

description.en:
57th JUMP New World Cartoon Award Associate Selection Work！The man repeats a timely group to prevent her death. At that time, she gave a shock confession…!!A science fiction romance reading that is spun in a traffic volume conversation play that does not stop after reading.

(Google Translate from shonenjumpplus)

title.en: Bijo to Kenja to Majin no Ken

altTitles.en: Beauty, Sage and the Devil's Sword

altTitles.ja: 美女と賢者と魔人の剣
美女与贤者与魔人之剑
美女與賢者與魔人之劍

description.en:
After falling into the gap between worlds, I gained “the ability to identify something’s status” for the cost of a single limitation. However, other than this skill I was completely ordinary. All I could do after landing in a strange world, was see through the status of things and use that information for my own growth.  
  
One day, after being assaulted by enemies, a lone figure appeared and saved my life. What’s more, that person had an incredible “secret”.  

---
  
**Links:**
- [Original Web Novel](http://ncode.syosetu.com/n4191cj/) (Raw)

altTitles.ja: シーザス
復活殺手JESUS

altTitles.en: Jesus (FUJIWARA Yoshihide)

description.en:
The underground speaks of hitman of incredible skill, this man goes by the name "Jesus." Why, you ask? because that happens to be last word to escape the lips of any fool unfortunate enough to be caught on the wrong end of his gun.


----

Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **J**

altTitles.ja: 30MS AROUND!

description.en:
"30MS 4-panel comic begins!"
Enjoy the relaxed everyday life of the sisters ✨

Official 4Koma posted on the 30 Minutes Sisters Twitter: https://x.com/30msisters
Also available on the Bandai Hobby Site: https://bandai-hobby.net/site/30minutes_sisters/extra/around/

altTitles.ja: 瀬戸さんを笑わせたい紬ちゃん

altTitles.en: Tsumugi-chan Wants to Make Seto-san Laugh

description.en:
Seto-san is a beautiful and cool class president. Her smiling face must be absolutely wonderful. I want to see it! 

This is a short comic in which Tsumugi-chan, a ditzy girl with whom Seto-san has had a little bit of contact with since the entrance ceremony, boldly tries various strategies to make Seto-san laugh — but usually fails. However, there seems to be something quite interesting about Seto-san...
description.ja: キレイでかっこいい学級委員長の瀬戸さん。笑った顔はきっと素敵なはず。……見たい！ 入学式のときからちょっと接点があったドジっ子の紬ちゃんが、果敢に瀬戸さんを笑わそうと多彩な作戦を繰り出して失敗するショートコミック。……なのだけど、瀬戸さんの様子がどうもおかしい！！！！

altTitles.ja: 雷雷雷

description.en: Fifty years after the war with the aliens...danger emerges...from within a young girl! Ichigaya Sumire, age 18, works at a "space pest" extermination company to pay off the debts her father left behind. But one day, her life is turned upside down when she's abducted by a UFO!
description.ja:
ガール・ミーツ・エイリアン！

エイリアンと戦争から50年――

市ヶ谷スミレ、18歳。父親の残した借金返済のため宇宙害蟲駆除会社に勤務する日々。そんなスミレの日常が、UFOにさらわれたことで一変する…！頭の中で聞こえる何者かの声…襲いかかる宇宙害獣…さらには軍事企業からも狙われて――！？

altTitles.ja: クッキングパパ

description.en:
Araiwa Kazumi is your run-of-the-mill salaryman and father. He’s also secretly an amazing chef! While his coworkers at Kanemaru Industries all eat out for lunch, he pulls out his lunchbox… It’s time for this cooking papa to show off his pro-level cooking skills!

(from Manga Helpers):

Araiwa Kazumi is an energetic salaryman who is able to perfectly manage his responsibilities at work and at home. Kazumi is also a fantastic chef, though many of his coworkers are unaware of it.

His wife Nijiko, who works as a journalist, has a bit of trouble making time for her home life. However, she tries to always be a cheerful mother.

With their son Makoto, who is 7 at the beginning of the story, they have a very happy family. This is a story that follows the Araiwa household and their delight with delicious food. Cooking instructions are also often included throughout the story.

---
- **Won the 39th Kodansha Manga Award Special Prize in 2015**

altTitles.en: Kowloon: Copoka
Kowloon: Saroka
Nine Dragons: Copoka
Nine Dragons: COPÓKA

description.en:
A Spinoff of <Castle 2: Pinnacle> - An action drama featuring Saroka 'Seo Jintae'!

Jintae becomes a killer after being saved by a man when he was at life's lowest point. While searching for his long-lost sister, he discovers that his younger sister is in Hong Kong and deeply involved with the Triad, Hong Kong's largest criminal organization. Thus begins Jintae's journey as he confronts the Triad in the nighttime streets of Hong Kong while searching for his sister.
description.ko:
<캐슬2:만인지상> 사로카 '서진태'의 액션활극!
삶의 끝자락에서 한 남자에게 구원을 받고 킬러가 된 서진태.
어렸을 적 헤어진 동생을 찾기 위해 수소문하던 중 동생이 홍콩에 있다는 것과
홍콩 최대의 범죄조직 삼합회와 깊게 관련되어 있다는 사실을 알게 된다.
그렇게 서진태는 밤의 도시 홍콩에서 삼합회와 맞서며 동생을 찾아 나서는데...

title.en: Moto Azadarake no Kanojo ga Shinpai de

altTitles.ja: 元 痣だらけの彼女が心配で

altTitles.en: I'm Worried About My Girlfriend, Who Used to be Covered in Bruises

altTitles.pl: Martwię Się o Moją Dziewczynę, Która Była Kiedyś Pokryta w Bliznach

altTitles.ru: Я беспокоюсь о своей девушке, которая раньше была вся в синяках

altTitles.tr: Eskiden Bandajlarla Kaplanmış Olan Kız Arkadaşım Hakkında Endileşeniyorum

altTitles.ro: Sunt Îngrijorat Pentru Iubita Mea, Care Obișnuia să Fie Acoperită de Vânătăi

altTitles.es-la: Estoy preocupado por mi novia que solía estar cubierta de moretones

description.en: Continuation of [Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de](https://mangadex.org/title/17447693-cb65-493d-8e21-dafb22d8340f/azadarake-no-classmate-ga-shinpai-de).
description.es-la: Continuación de [Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de](https://mangadex.org/title/17447693-cb65-493d-8e21-dafb22d8340f/azadarake-no-classmate-ga-shinpai-de).

altTitles.ja: ルリドラゴン

altTitles.en: RuriDragon

description.en:
Ruri, a high school student, woke up one morning to find that she had suddenly grown horns on her head!

Her mother told her that she might have inherited it because her father is a dragon. Ruri's mother tells her that she might have inherited it from her father, and she is puzzled, but goes to school anyway....

Her classmates are curious about the spontaneous horn, and another dragon constitution is revealed!

With a slight change in the usual routine, the daily life of Dragon Girl Ruri begins!
description.tr: Tembellik ve çalışkanlık arasında git gel yaşayan ejder kızın gündelik maceraları.
description.pt-br: Ruri Aoki é uma garota normal que um dia acorda com um par de chifres em sua cabeça. De acordo com sua mãe, o pai de Ruri, que ela nunca conheceu antes, é um dragão e Ruri só é metade humana. Esta é a história da jornada de autodescobrimento e aceitação de uma garota metade humana, metade dragão.

title.en: The Self-Cultivation of the Cannon Fodder Female Lead: Talking About Mulberry and Hemp With You

altTitles.zh: Paohui Nv Zhu De Ziwo Xiuyang: Yu Jun Hua Sang Ma
Pàohuī Nǚ Zhǔ De Zìwǒ Xiūyǎng: Yǔ Jūn Huà Sāng Má
炮灰女主的自我修养：与君话桑麻

description.en: Sang Mo, a little-known girl cartoonist, suffered a cardiac arrest after working all night for several consecutive days. Instead of GG, her life began a new chapter. In a trance, she seemed to see a strange girl crying to a man, and then she was burned. Shocked, Sang Mo woke up again and found herself in an unfamiliar woodshed. What on earth was going on? What place is this? Oh my god, she didn't... (cliche) travel through time, did she?

title.en: Kore kara Dandan Shiawase ni Natte Iku Kowai Onna Joushi

altTitles.ja: これからだんだん幸せになっていく怖い 女上司

altTitles.ar: رئيسة مرعبة تزداد سعادة وسعادة من الآن فصاعدًا

altTitles.ja-ro: Kore kara Dandan Shiawase ni Natte Iku Kowai Onna Joushi
Korekara Dondon Shiawase ni Natte iku Kowai Jōshi

altTitles.en: A Scary Boss, But From Now on She's Going to Be Happier and Happier

altTitles.es-la: Una jefa que da miedo, pero a partir de ahora va a ser cada vez más feliz.

description.ar: مديرتي مخيفة للغايه، لكن من الأن وصاعدًا سأبذل قصارى جهدي لجعلها الأسعد.
description.en:
This is a heart-pounding love comedy between "Manager Tsuruse'', a female boss who is scary at work but whose hobbies are cute clothes(?!), and "Tsukinawa-kun'', a new male employee who joins the company mid-career!

There is also a FANBOX version, a collection of 0.5 "Naughty" stories: 
[Kowai Onna Joushi ga Nuidara H de Kawaikatta Hanashi - FANBOX 0.5 Matome【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/ef970af6-8357-43bb-9bd1-fe09dba78624/kowai-onna-joushi-ga-nuidara-h-de-kawaikatta-hanashi-fanbox-0-5-matome)
description.es-la: Mi jefa da mucho miedo, pero mientras más hablo con ella deja de hacerlo.

description.en: Pairing: Akashi Seijuurou x Kuroko Tetsuya

title.en: In no Hunter wa SSS-Kyuu Akuma to Keiyaku Suru

altTitles.ja: 陰のハンターはSSS級悪魔と契約する

altTitles.ja-ro: In no Hunter wa SSS-Kyuu Akuma to Keiyaku Suru

altTitles.en: The Shadow Hunter Makes a Deal With an SSS Class Demon

description.en: One day, the world was invaded by "demons" that appeared from a gate. Humans, who made contracts with the "Divine Spirits," a race destroyed by the demons, gained supernatural powers and began fighting against the demons. Makoto Asuka, who had become a Hunter, had been a shadowed figure for two years as no Divine Spirit had appeared for him. However, in front of him appeared a beautiful girl who sought a contract. But it turns out she's not a Divine Spirit, but a demon...!?
Pairing: Akashi Seijuurou x Kuroko Tetsuya

title.en: Fushi no Kami: Rebuilding Civilization Starts with a Village

altTitles.ja-ro: Fushi no Kami ~Henkyou kara Hajimeru Bunmei Saiseiki~

altTitles.ja: フシノカミ～辺境から始める文明再生記～

description.en: Ash is a young boy with apparent past-life memories who lives in a remote, deserted village. As he remembers leading a bountiful life, he can’t bear living in a world akin to the Dark Ages, where not even the internal combustion engine exists. Ash envisions the rebirth of a civilization where housing with proper sanitation is the norm and the world is connected via a means of transportation faster than horses. For that reason, he is eager to consult books containing knowledge from a highly-developed ancient culture that is rumored to have existed far in the past. Ash makes use of the church’s resources, learning how to read and obtaining the knowledge that he seeks. In addition, he enlists the help of the people around him, including Maika, the village chief’s daughter. Together, they aim to develop their own village. This is only the beginning of the story about a young boy who sets out to revolutionize the world in order to rebuild civilization and create his ideal life!
description.ja:
――意志を繋いだのは、いつだって本だった。

辺境の農村で暮らす少年アッシュには秘密があった。それは今より遙かに豊かな前世らしき記憶を持っている事。あまりに貧しく、辛い生活の中で、決意する――記憶にある便利な生活を、今世に取り戻そう、と。その鍵こそが、古代文明の叡智が記されたという〝書物〟の解読だった――。

altTitles.ja: 幼なじみ幽霊と死にたがり男

altTitles.en: A Suicidal Man and The Ghost of His Childhood Friend

description.en:
A young man named Akihiro visits an abandoned apartment complex. His goal is to help the spirit of his dead childhood friend, Kaedeko, to rest in peace. But Akihiro's plan meets an unexpected turn...?

An emotional story about a young man who wants to die and his childhood friend who has already died!!!
description.ja: 廃墟となった団地を訪れた青年・アキヒロ。その目的は、死んだ幼馴染・楓子の霊を成仏させることだった。しかしアキヒロの計画は意外なもので…？死にたい青年×死んでしまった幼馴染のエモーショナルストーリー!!

altTitles.ja: 若葉さんちの青い恋

altTitles.ja-ro: Wakaba San Chi no Aoi Koi

altTitles.en: The Wakaba Home's Blue Loves
The Wakaba Home's Green Loves

altTitles.vi: Tình Yêu Màu Lam Nhà Wakaba

description.en: Youth romcom about 4 sisters who are all experiencing their first love at the same time. While the eldest is having a crush on the guy at her part-time work, the other three are dealing with their first romantic experiences with boys in their classes and school clubs. Every night, the four have heart-to-heart girls talks as they navigate their respective first loves.
description.ja: 若葉家四姉妹は今、全員が“初恋”の真っ最中。 長女・心春（こはる）はバイト先の先輩、 次女・真夏（まなつ）は趣味が一緒の弓道部の子、 三女・秋楽（あきら）は同じ部活の同級生、 四女・千冬は同じクラスの男子、 それぞれ好きな人に「好き」って気持ちをどう伝えようか 仲の良い四姉妹は日夜、恋のお悩み相談を繰り広げています。 四姉妹それぞれの片想いを見守る “初恋”観察ラブコメディー、開幕！ ◆作者コメント 初連載です！　がんばります！！
description.vi:
Dưới mái nhà kia, có đến bốn trái tim đang loạn nhịp!

Nhà Wakaba có bốn chị em, ai nấy đều đang tuổi xuân căng mọng, xinh đẹp vô bờ.
Và tất nhiên rồi, cái tuổi học sinh sinh viên mới nhú mà, dĩ nhiên phải có gia vị tình yêu quyện vào nó mới trọn vẹn được. Chị cả thì phải lòng tiền bối ở chỗ làm thêm, chị hai, ba và cô em út thì đang phải lòng bạn cùng trường. Và rồi cứ mỗi đêm, cả nhà lại ngồi quây quần với nhau, tâm sự chuyện yêu đương đàn đúm đủ kiểu. Liệu cặp nào sẽ bùng nổ trước đây ta?

Còn nội dung sâu xa thể nào ấy hả? Vào đọc đi rồi biết, hứa không uổng thì giờ hảo ngọt của bạn đâu!

altTitles.ja: アキレス

altTitles.en: The Female Lead Has an Affair With My Fiancé
The Heroine Had an Affair With My Fiancé

description.en:
She became an extra who died because of her rubbish fiancé. She succeeded in becoming best friends with the heroine in order to twist the original plot.

"I'm sorry, Ciel. But we're still friends, right?"

The heroine had an affair with my fiancé. Yeah, go ahead and take that trash.

"Would you like to have a revenge affair with someone who's been the victim of an affair, Your Highness?"

'Cause I decided to have the Male Lead. Since I've broken my engagement, I can start getting the Male Lead after getting out of the original story and decided to enjoy a happy life. After a while, rumors have spread that I was the Crown's Prince lover and was raking in money. And there's also the news that the two had broken up.

"Ciel, I was wrong. Can we still be friends?"

"Ciel… I was foolish. You are the only one that I love. You love me too, right? So let's start over."

What? Are they both out of their minds? Throwing their hands away, I raised the corners of my lips.

"Don't make me laugh. Get out of here."

altTitles.ja: シャイ

description.en: In the middle of the 21st century, the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted, the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters. This is the story about the young Japanese heroine named "Shy"…
description.fr:
Au milieu du XXIe siècle, le monde était au bord de la troisième guerre mondiale. Mais des super-héros du monde entier sont apparus et ont contribué à l'avènement d'une ère de paix. La crise ayant été évitée, les Héros sont retournés dans leur pays d'origine où ils apportent désormais leur aide pour les affaires intérieures. C'est l'histoire de la jeune héroïne japonaise nommée « Shy »…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.id: Di pertengahan abad ke-21, dunia berada di ambang Perang Dunia ke III. Tapi pahlawan super dari seluruh dunia muncul dan membantu membawa era perdamaian. Bersamaan menghindari krisis, para Pahlawan kembali ke negara asal mereka di mana mereka sekarang membantu masalah-masalah dalam negerinya. Ini adalah kisah tentang pahlawan muda dari Jepang bernama "Shy"…
description.pt: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada "Shy"…
description.ru: В середине 21-го века мир был на гране третьей мировой войны. Но супер герои, появившиеся по всему миру, помогли принести в мир покой. Разобравшись с этим, герои вернулись в свои страны, где теперь помогают с местными проблемами. Эта же история о японской героини “Стесняшка”…
description.th: ในช่วงกลางศตวรรษที่ 21 โลกได้ตกอยู่ในยุคของสงครามโลกครั้งที่สาม แต่แล้วได้มีฮีโร่ปรากฏตัวขึ้นจากทั่วโลก และช่วยนำพายุคแห่งสันติภาพกลับคืนมา หลังจากวิกฤตได้ผ่านพ้นไป ฮีโร่แต่ละคนได้กลับไปยังประเทศบ้านเกิดของพวกเขา เพื่อช่วยเหลือภัยพิบัติที่เกิดขึ้นในของแต่ละประเทศของตัวเอง …นี่คือเรื่องราวเกี่ยวกับ สาวน้อยฮีโร่ชาวญี่ปุ่น ที่มีนามว่า "ฌาย"…
description.tr:
21. yüzyılın ortasında, dünya III. Dünya Savaşının eşiğindeydi. Süper kahramanlar dünyanın çeşitli yerlerinde ortaya çıktı ve barış çağını getirmeye yardımcı oldular. Kriz önlendiği için tüm kahramanlar kendi ülkelerine döndü ve iç meselelere yardım etmeye başladılar. Bu "SHY" adlı Japon Kadın Kahramanının hikayesi…?  


---

 Author's Twitter: [@bukimi397](https://twitter.com/bukimi397)
description.vi:
Vào giữa thế kỷ 21, trong số các anh hùng có mặt khắp nơi trên khắp thế giới xuất hiện một anh hùng siêu xấu hổ đến từ Nhật Bản với biệt danh là "Shy".
Cô gánh trên mình trách nhiệm của một anh hùng, mặc dù bản thân rất kém trong việc đối mặt với ánh mắt đến từ mọi người.
Dù gặp biết bao gian khó và khổ đau, nhưng Shy vẫn đứng lên vì những người xung quanh...! 
Không chỉ dừng ở những cuộc xung đột, SHY còn là câu chuyện về tình người, về sự đồng tâm hiệp lực của các anh hùng để cùng nhau tiến về phía trước!
Câu chuyện trưởng thành về anh hùng mang tấm lòng nhân ái!
description.es-la: A mediados del siglo 21, el mundo estaba al borde de la 3ra Guerra Mundial. Sin embargo, alrededor del mundo, héroes comenzaron a aparecer y ayudaron a traer la paz a esta era. Con esa crisis habiendo sido evitada, los héroes regresaron a sus paises de origen donde ahora ayudan con asuntos internos. Esta historia se trata de la joven heroína japonesa llamada "Shy"…

altTitles.en: Survive As The Hero’s Husband!

altTitles.vi: Chàng Rể Mạnh Nhất Lịch Sử

description.en:
Shen Lang traveled to the past and became a matrilocal son-in-law of a wealthy family. And yet he was kicked out for being a good-for-nothing. So he swore that he would marry a more powerful and striking noblewoman.

I'm not going to practice martial arts in my whole life! I'll groom my wife to be the No.1 martial master in the world! She will kick the ass of anyone who dares to mess with me!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Bilibili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc32611)
description.pt-br: Sheng lang foi expulso de casa por ser um desperdício de comida e oxigênio, coisas aconteceram e ele acabou em outro mundo, para sobreviver nesse novo mundo ele precisa aprender artes marciais mas como ele é muito preguiçoso e fraco ele concluiu que sua melhor opção é encontrar uma esposa bonita, rica e talentosa e ser apenas um marido troféu que passa seus dias aproveitando as riquezas da vida!! E se alguém se atreve a perturbar sua paz, ele vai dizer a sua esposa para chutar seus traseiros!!!

title.en: The Main Duties of the Vice President

altTitles.ja: 副会長の主なお仕事

altTitles.en: The Main and Favourite Duties of Ms. Kurishita

description.en: In the student council room, you'll never find more than two people: the president, Haiya Gin (that's me), and the vice president, Kurishita Namida. We used to have a bunch of other officers too, but since the vice president took care of everything so easily, everyone stopped coming. She's incredibly beautiful, and an honor student with no flaws to speak of, but... For some reason, she's always messing with me, and only me?! A comedy featuring the antics of a strangely doting, tall vice president and an adorably tiny president begins!!!
description.ja: 生徒会室にはいつも2人しかいない――会長の私と副会長の栗下涙。最初は他にもいろんな役職がいたけど、こいつが仕事を全部片づけてしまうのでみんな来なくなった。容姿端麗で文句なしの優等生なのだが…私にだけいつも変なちょっかいをかけてくる――!?お淑やかの皮を被って行われる愛ゆえの暴走――密室の生徒会で起こるヤバめ偏愛コメディ、ここに開幕！

altTitles.ja: 聖くんは清く生きたい

altTitles.en: Hijiri-kun Wants to Live a Pure Life

altTitles.ne: हिजिरी-कुन एक पवित्र जीवन बिताउन चाहन्छ

altTitles.es-la: Hijiri-kun quiere vivir una vida pura

altTitles.vi: Hijiri-kun Chỉ Muốn Sống Thanh Liêm

description.en: Tsuchimikado Hijiri is a man playing the role of the perfect student council president, with his good looks and excellent grades in both school and sports. After school, he witnesses his usually quiet female classmate Sado Mitsuki, tormenting their teacher Tamura in a very sadistic way! The perfect student council president gets caught up in Sado-san's secret fetish!
description.ja: 文武両道、容姿端麗、パーフェクトな生徒会長を演じ切る男、土御門聖。そんな聖が放課後に見てしまったのは、いつもはおとなしいクラスメイト・佐渡さんがドSに教師をいじめる姿だった――！佐渡の秘められし性癖に、完璧な生徒会長が巻き込まれていく…！人には言えないコトがあるアナタに贈る、異色ラブコメ！
description.es-la:
Tsuchimikado Hijiri es un hombre que desempeña el papel del perfecto presidente del consejo estudiantil, con su buena apariencia y excelentes calificaciones tanto en la escuela como en los deportes.  Después de la escuela, es testigo de cómo su normalmente tranquila compañera de clase, Sado Mitsuki, atormenta a su maestro Tamura de una manera muy sádica.  ¡El perfecto presidente del consejo estudiantil queda atrapado en el fetiche secreto de Sado-san!

 ¡Esta es una comedia romántica inusual para aquellos que tienen cosas que no pueden contarles a los demás!

description.en: Ye Ji-an, the only S-class guide in Korea, was often called the “useless guide” due to her unique trait of having a 0% matching rate with all espers. After failing to match with an esper from Russia and on her way back home, she is suddenly swept away by a gate manifestation and wakes up alone in a strange temple-like place. The world she has traveled to through the gate is the continent of Wisrode, filled only with espers, and in this place, Ji-an is the only guide…

title.en: Gokumama~The Story of a Yakuza Who Became a Mom~

altTitles.ja: ごくまま～極道だったオレがママになった話～

altTitles.vi: Gokumama~Chuyện về tôi, một Yakuza trở thành mẹ~

description.en: A yakuza who was supposed to be dead suddenly reincarnates as a pregnant woman just about to give birth! Now a single mother with the spirit of a hardened gangster, he faces the challenges of parenting for the first time. This is a hilarious yet touching manga that takes readers through the ups and downs of raising a child in the chaotic world of yakuza, with plenty of unexpected charm and humor.
description.vi: Một yakuza đáng lẽ đã chết, bỗng nhiên tái sinh thành một bà bầu đang chuẩn bị sinh! Với tâm hồn của một tay anh chị chính hiệu nhưng giờ lại trong thân phận của một bà mẹ đơn thân, anh phải đối mặt với hành trình nuôi con đầu tiên đầy gian nan và thử thách. Đây là một bộ manga hài hước và cảm động, đưa độc giả qua những tình huống dở khóc dở cười về hành trình nuôi dạy con với bối cảnh yakuza đầy sóng gió và sự duyên dáng bất ngờ.

title.en: A Modern Man Who Transmigrated Into the Murim World

altTitles.en: Modern Dude in the Murim
Modern Man Falling Into the World of Murim
A Modern Man Who Got Transmigrated to Murim

altTitles.es-la: Un hombre moderno en el Murim

description.en: I was a public official who worked part-time to survive. I was knocked out by a speeding car while making deliveries in the middle of the night. I have a strong memory of dying prematurely in a hit-and-run. “…I’m Jo Hwi?” At some point, I became the second son of the collapsing Jo Ga-cheol Clan. This family has neither the authority to drop a flying bird nor the power to carry out one’s will. There is only an enormous amount of debt that can annihilate the entire family. There’s only one way out! “Father, please pass the Jo Ga-cheol Clan on to me.” The story of a successful modern man who has to utilize all the knowledge and experience of a public official begins now!!

altTitles.ms: Melebihi Suami Isteri, Namun Bukan Kekasih.

altTitles.en: More Than A Married Couple, But Not Lovers.

altTitles.ja: 夫婦以上、恋人未満。

altTitles.pt-br: Mais do que um casal, menos do que um amante.

altTitles.th: แผนสมรักไม่สมเลิฟ

altTitles.de: Mehr wie ein Ehepaar, aber weniger als Liebhaber.

description.en: Jirou, a third-year in high school, is forced to live with a gyaru named Akari under a course called the "Couple Practical". In order to be paired with their own romantic interests, they're going to act as a married couple…!?
description.ja: 高校三年生になった次郎は、「夫婦実習」という授業の一環で非リア充な自分とは正反対の存在のクラスのギャル・渡辺星と一緒に暮らすことになってしまう。だが、ペアを入れ替えられる制度を知った二人は、それぞれの好きな人と一緒になるために無理矢理【夫婦】らしい事を演じるのだが…!?
description.vi: Yakuin Jirou, nam sinh năm ba cao trung. Cậu ta buộc phải sống chung nhà với một gái Gyaru tên là Watanabe Akari. Lý do là vì đợt huấn luyện “Cặp đôi“ của trường mà hai người họ theo học. Để được sống với người tình trong mộng của mình, hai người họ phải đã lên kế hoạch sống cùng nhau như một cặp vợ chồng.

altTitles.ja: 恋色の境界 (東方)

altTitles.en: Border of Love Colors (Touhou Project)

description.en: A Touhou Project Doujinshi Series
